FunctionOracle.name: F_FDSL_RECAP_FACTU_V2
FunctionOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION AXIONEUSER_FACTU.F_FDSL_RECAP_FACTU_V2 (V_FAI in varchar2, V_DSP in varchar2, V_TECHNO in varchar2,
v_terme IN varchar2,v_mode IN varchar2)

return SYS_REFCURSOR as

TYPE t_cursor is REF CURSOR;
v_cursor t_cursor;

BEGIN

open v_cursor FOR
select T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.ID_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE as ID_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.FAI as FAI,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.DSP as DSP,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.TECHNO as TECHNO,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.MOIS as MOIS,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.ANNEE as ANNEE,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.LIBELLE as LIBELLE,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.TYPE_FACTU as TYPE_FACTU,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.DATE_CALC_FACTU as DATE_CALC_FACTU,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.MODE_FACTU as MODE_FACTU,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.TERME_FACTU as TERME_FACTU,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.MONTANT as MONTANT,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.FREQUENCE_FACTU as FREQUENCE_FACTU,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.STATUT as STATUT,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.USER_CREATION as USER_CREATION,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.DATE_CREATION as DATE_CREATION,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.USER_MODIF as USER_MODIF,
T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE.DATE_MODIF as DATE_MODIF
from T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE T_FDSL_RECAP_FACTURE
where FAI like replace(V_FAI,'Tous','%%') and DSP like replace(V_DSP,'Tous','%%') and
TECHNO
-- in (replace(V_TECHNO,':',''','''))
like replace(V_TECHNO,'Tous','%%')
and
TERME_FACTU like replace(V_TERME,'Tous','%%') and
MODE_FACTU like replace(V_MODE,'Tous','%%');

RETURN v_cursor;
END F_FDSL_RECAP_FACTU_V2;
